description: This file sets up an AI agent with a specific language model, storage backend, and tools, then makes it respond to two questions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that interacts with a language model, storage, and tools.

classes.name: Groq
classes.description: A language model class used for the agent.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: A storage backend implementation using PostgreSQL.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output the response from the agent to a given prompt.
